name: C_DEFINED_OBJECT
documentation: Abstract parent type of C_OBJECT subtypes that are defined by value, i.e. whose definitions are actually in the archetype rather than being by reference.

assumed_value.name: assumed_value
assumed_value.documentation: Value to be assumed if none sent in data.

valid_value.name: valid_value
valid_value.documentation: True if a_value is valid with respect to constraint expressed in concrete instance of this type.

prototype_value.name: prototype_value
prototype_value.documentation: Generate a prototype value from this constraint object.

has_assumed_value.name: has_assumed_value
has_assumed_value.documentation: True if there is an assumed value.

default_value.name: default_value
default_value.documentation: Generate a default value from this constraint object.

any_allowed.name: any_allowed
any_allowed.documentation: True if any value of the reference model type being constrained is allowed. Redefine in descendants.
